sourcesContent: import { memo, useState, useEffect } from 'react' import BackgroundHome from '../../images/bgHome.jpg' import { Combobox, ComboboxInput, ComboboxPopover, ComboboxList, ComboboxOption } from '@reach/combobox' import { FaRegPaperPlane } from 'react-icons/fa' import { english, vietnamese } from '../../Languages/Home'; import { english as englishTourList, vietnamese as vietnameseTourList } from '../../Languages/TourList'; import { english as englishCategory, vietnamese as vietnameseCategory } from '../../Languages/TourCategory'; import './TourList.scss' function TourList({ languageSelected }) { const languageList = (languageSelected === 'EN' ? english : vietnamese) const optionSideBar = (languageSelected === 'EN' ? englishTourList : vietnameseTourList) const optionCategory = (languageSelected === 'EN' ? englishCategory : vietnameseCategory) const [optionPrice, setOptionPrice] = useState(0) return (
